name: ds-shopify-boilerplate
description: Git boilerplate respository for the Shopify Themes.
author: Vadym Lavorchuk <lavorchuk.vadim@digitalsuits.co>

scripts.watch: concurrently "theme watch" "parcel watch scripts/scripts.js -d assets -o scripts.js --no-hmr" "parcel watch styles/styles.scss -d assets -o styles.css --no-hmr"
scripts.deploy: concurrently "parcel build scripts/scripts.js -d assets -o scripts.js" "parcel build styles/styles.scss -d assets -o styles.css" && theme deploy
